A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I understand some \"fans\" are disappointed in this movie - to them I say you are correct: this is not the nostalgia-wank bang bang shoot'em up Skywalker soap opera.\n\nLast Jedi advanced the story into the future past the Skywalker soap opera saga. It gives the potential for the universe of Star Wars to be explored\, and did so in a way that was visually similar and different to the original trilogy. Depending on how 9 goes I might say this is my favorite.
